name: R4-consent-state-codes-for-R5
title: Cross-version VS for R4.ConsentState for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/consent-state-codes|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R4 to R5.
